# init(duration:timingFunction:)

**Initializer**

Creates a transition with a duration and timing function.

## Declaration

```swift
init(duration: TimeInterval = 0, timingFunction: AnimationTimingFunction = .default)
```
title: init(duration:timingFunction:)
